attributes.action: ALL KEYWORKERS working extra hours during the Covid pandemic to be taxed exempt
attributes.additional_details: Because I feel as a key worker myself to have to work these mass hours and have it taken away from us through tax is not fair and we will be working these extra hours for basically “FREE”
attributes.background: All the keyworkers having to work extra hours during this Covid-19 pandemic to be taxed exempt. All the key workers will be working these extra hours, but loosing the money from being taxed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
